Text:
Nice, any good programs to use to convert to say ePub or Mobi?

KaraokeKing123 passed off more of my books as their own... damn pissing me off! This time they passed off Michael Koryta.

First it was Paul Christopher's Templar Series, then Frank Peretti, then The Innocent, and now my Michael Koryta books.
Try - Calibre. I am no expert in this field but it seems to work OK.
